programme.title: The American Society of Magical Negroes
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Justice Smith and David Alan Grier. Genial artist Aren, who is African-American, is struggling to make sense of his place in the world until he's invited to join a secret society dedicated to enhancing the lives of white people. However, Aren's debut mission tests his loyalty when he and his first assignment fall for the same person Kobi Libii - Director Justice Smith - Aren David Alan Grier - Roger An-Li Bogan - Lizzie Drew Tarver - Jason Munt Aisha Hinds - Gabbard.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Musical adaptation of Alice Walker's novel, starring Fantasia Barrino and Taraji P Henson. In early 20th-century Georgia, young Celie is forced to marry the tyrannical farmer "Mister". For years, Celie's life is bleak and difficult, but when Mister's mistress, the spirited jazz singer Shug Avery, comes to stay, Celie begins to believe in herself Blitz Bazawule - Director Fantasia Barrino - Celie Taraji P Henson - Shug Avery Danielle Brooks - Sofia Colman Domingo - Mister Corey Hawkins - Harpo H.E.R. - Squeak Halle Bailey - Young Nettie Aunjanue Ellis - Mama Louis Gossett Jr - Ol' Mister David Alan Grier - Rev Avery Elizabeth Marvel - Miss Millie Deon Cole - Alfonso.

programme.title: One More Shot
programme.desc: A Navy SEAL squad leader escorts a suspected terrorist from a black site when they come under fire from a group of mercenaries. Director James Nunn's thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Alexis Knapp and Tom Berenger James Nunn - Director Scott Adkins - Jake Harris Michael Jai White - Robert Jackson Alexis Knapp - Jennifer Lomax Hannah Arterton - Agent Hooper Tom Berenger - Mike Marshall Jill Winternitz - Kelly Harris.

programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. Comedy, starring Conan O'Brien, Martin Herlihy, John Higgins and Ben Marshall, narrated by John Goodman Paul Briganti - Director Martin Herlihy - Martin John Higgins - John Ben Marshall - Ben Conan O'Brien - Farley X Mayo - Taylor Megan Stalter - Megan.

programme.title: Jules

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Sci Fi, Action, Thriller ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: An ancient relic of alien biotechnology known as the Scarab chooses college graduate Jaime Reyes as its symbiotic host. He is transformed into the superhero Blue Beetle, who is protected by a suit of armour. However, powerful businesswoman Victoria Kord will stop at nothing to acquire the Scarab. programme.title: Insidious: The Red Door
programme.desc: Ten years have passed since Josh Lambert and son Dalton escaped from The Further and reunited with Renai. Dalton is preparing to leave home for an Ivy League university, until demons from the past resurface with a vengeance and threaten to destroy Dalton and everyone around him. programme.title: The Meg
programme.sub-title: Action, Thriller, Drama, Horror, Sci Fi ║ 2018 ║ 12
programme.desc: Action horror thriller starring Jason Statham and Li Bingbing. After failing to save the crew of an imperilled submarine, deep sea rescue diver Jonas Taylor is unfairly branded a drunk and a coward. programme.title: Meg 2: The Trench
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Horror, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Action ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Underwater rescue expert Jonas Taylor leads a research team on an exploratory dive into the deepest depths of the ocean. programme.title: Five Nights at Freddy's
programme.desc: Mike Schmidt accepts a position as night-time security guard at the abandoned pizzeria, where families used to flock in their droves in the 1980s. He is desperate to earn money to keep a roof over the head of his younger sister Abby, but is soon locked in a fight for survival. programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: Franklin, a blogger, scuppers an attack against tech guru Anton Burrell, and finds a ring that the pioneering genius dropped. programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: An apparently unassuming man finds someone very important to him has been scammed and driven to harm. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Drama, Crime/detective, Romance, Thriller ║ 2000 ║ 12
programme.desc: Action comedy starring Sandra Bullock and Michael Caine. Hard-nosed FBI agent Gracie Hart is about as far removed from a beauty queen as you could find. But when a terrorist threatens the Miss United States beauty contest, she is the only person available to go under cover and thwart the attack. programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: Sequel to the 2000 action comedy, starring Sandra Bullock. After saving the day at the Miss United States beauty contest, FBI Agent Gracie Hart has become a media sensation. programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Kate Winslet. programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Anthony Hopkins and Johnny Flynn. In 1938, young British stockbroker Nicholas Winton visits Prague and becomes involved in an audacious plan to evacuate hundreds of Jewish children before the Nazis close the borders. programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Biographical comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman. In 1980s Washington, charismatic Texas politician Charles Wilson is notorious for his hard-drinking, drug-taking and womanising lifestyle, earning the nickname "Good Time Charlie". But the seemingly carefree congressman is stirred into action when socialite Joanne Herring draws his attention to the plight of the Afghan people suffering under Soviet occupation. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. programme.title: Skincare

programme.title: Afraid
programme.sub-title: Horror, Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ 15
programme.desc: Computer engineering company executive Curtis is coerced into testing a new digital assistant named AIA to secure a lucrative business contract with two tech geniuses. programme.sub-title: Action, Family, Drama, Animation, Comedy, Fantasy, Children's, Sci Fi ║ 2024 ║ PG

programme.title: PL: Leeds v United 96/97
programme.desc: United Archives 7/9/96. Eric Cantona is in the United line up and returns to his former club as the Reds take on Leeds.

programme.title: PL: Rapid Vienna v United 96/97
programme.desc: United Archives 4/12/96. A win in a freezing Vienna and United would make the quarter finals of the Champions League.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Bruce
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Steve Bruce. Not only did he star for the Reds as a team won our first title for 26 years but he also became club captain.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Christian Eriksen
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Christian Eriksen. He addresses the obstacles he has overcome and explains why he left Italy, swapping Inter Milan for a return to the Premier League.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Sheringham
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast. Former striker Teddy Sheringham talks about his footballing journey that led to him emerging as a key figure at the climax of the unforgettable 1998/99 season.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Altay Bayindir
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with GK Altay Bayindir, the first Turkish player ever to sign for Manchester United.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Johny Evans Pt 1
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with fan's favourite Jonny Evans who shares all on his lifelong love affair with Manchester United.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Johny Evans Pt 2
programme.desc: Watch part 2 of our latest UTD Podcast with fan's favourite Jonny Evans who shares all on his lifelong love affair with Manchester United.

programme.title: UTD Podcast: Memories unite us: By Cad
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast, in collaboration with Cadbury, for a trip down memory lane.

programme.title: UTD Podcast: Gary Neville
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with class of '92 graduate, treble winner and former club captain, Gary Neville.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Keith Hackett
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with former referee and general manager of the PGMOL, Keith Hackett.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Paul McGuinness
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with former academy coach Paul McGuinness who shares stories about his farther Wilf and Uncle Bobby.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Jimmy Nicholl
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with defensive stalwart Jimmy Nicholl, telling some riveting stories from his time at United between 1975 and 1981.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Marc Skinner
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Marc Skinner who reflects back on an incredible season for our women's team.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Strachan
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with former United winger Gordon Strachan. We cover it all, from the early days at Dundee, to enjoying success home and away under Sir Alex Ferguson at Aberdeen FC.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Schweinsteiger
programme.desc: Deutscher Fussballmeister spoke glowingly of United's interim manager, Ralf Rangnick, and midfielder Scott McTominay, whose talent stood out to Schweinsteiger when he was training with Reserves.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Jimmy Greenhoff
programme.desc: Jimmy told us how Stoke were forced to sell him to pay for stadium repairs. He was adamant he didn't want to leave, until he heard Sir Matt Busby had called looking to bring him to Man Utd.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Luke Chadwick
programme.desc: Chaddy told us the hilarious reason for once missing a training session and the attempt at covering it up, which landed him in a web of lies with Sir Alex.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Rio Ferdinand
programme.desc: Rio and the Pod team explore Old Trafford to recall his memories on the pitch, bust-ups in the tunnel and inspirational team talks in the dressing room.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Tim Howard
programme.desc: Tim opened up about his challenges growing up with Tourette's Syndrome, and how playing soccer was a way to free himself from the hurdles the diagnosis put in his way.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Sir Alex
programme.desc: This is the one. Your 60 minutes with The Boss. We covered everything from Cristiano Ronaldo's dramatic Old Trafford return, to signing Eric Cantona on a lunch break.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Raimond
programme.desc: The former United keeper looks back on his time at Old Trafford and reveals the highs and lows of working alongside Peter Schmeichel.

programme.title: Utd Podcast: Phil Jones
programme.desc: Phil gave us an update on his fitness and how mentally difficult it has been watching from the sidelines. He reflected on his career so far, including the highs of winning the Premier League.

programme.title: PL: Derby v United 00/01
programme.desc: United Archives 25/11/00. Sir Alex's side were looking for an eighth straight victory when they took on struggling Derby County.

programme.title: PL: United v Ipswich 00/01

programme.title: PL: Stoke City v United 10/11

programme.desc: United Archives 25/1/11. Dimitar Berbatov inspires a classic comeback to take The Reds five clear in the title race.

programme.title: PL: United v Arsenal 05/06
programme.desc: United Archives 9/4/06. Always a big game when these teams meet. United were hoping to keep the pressure on Chelsea at the top of the league.

programme.title: PL: United v Crystal Palace 04/05
programme.desc: United Archives 18/12/04. United open their festive fixture list with the visit of Iain Dowie's Crystal Palace to Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL: Leeds v United 01/02
programme.desc: United Archives 30/3/02. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer inspired United to a vital win over Premiership rivals Leeds in a seven-goal thriller at Elland Road.
